sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Customer_layout from '../../../pages/customer_layout'; import { useParams, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; export default ({ data }) => { const history = useHistory(); const { id } = useParams(); const singleProduct = data.find(product => product.id == id ); const [ product, setProduct ] = useState(); const onHandleChange = (e) => { console.log(e.target.value); setProduct({price: singleProduct.price, count: e.target.value}); console.log(product); } const section = <>

{singleProduct.name}

{singleProduct.price}

history.push('/cart') } >Add To Cart

  • Ordering Information
  • Specifications
Material Description Packaging
OTC022401 Pain Management: Acetaminophen PM Extra-Strength Caplets, 500 mg, 100/Bottle 1 BT
OTC022401 Pain Management: Acetaminophen PM Extra-Strength Caplets, 500 mg, 100/Bottle 144/CS
OTC022401 Pain Management: Acetaminophen PM Extra-Strength Caplets, 500 mg, 100/Bottle 1 EA
HPIS CODE 999_200_40_0
HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS ONLY No
LATEX FREE Yes, No
MEDICATION ROUTE Topical
return ( <> ) }
